fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.MainPanel.ButtonsPanel.Login"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"//this condition will be executed when username and password are not empty or not null\\n//console.log(passwordTxtBx.value);\\n//var pwd = passwordTxtBx.value;\\n//var data = {'UserLoginID':userNameTxtBx.value.toUpperCase()\,'PasswordIn':passwordTxtBx.value\,'FormType':'Submit'};\\nvar xmldata = \\"<data><UserLoginID>\\"+userNameTxtBx.value.toUpperCase()+\\"</UserLoginID><PasswordIn>\\"+passwordTxtBx.value+\\"</PasswordIn><FormType>Submit</FormType></data>\\";\\nvar URL = 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/CheckEWBUserID';\\nif(userNameTxtBx.value!==null && userNameTxtBx.value!==\\"\\" && passwordTxtBx.value!==null && passwordTxtBx.value!==\\"\\"){\\n //console.log(passwordTxtBx.value);\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\, \\n data: xmldata\,\\n url: URL\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n // console.log(data);\\n //if given user credentials are valid\, then below if condition is executed\\n if(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"OutputMessage\\")[0].innerHTML==\\"Valid\\"){\\n var input={'UserLoginID': userNameTxtBx.value};\\n var b = window.btoa(JSON.stringify(input));\\n guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/forms/af/caltrans-fragments/sprint3-new/welcome-statement.html?wcmmode=disabled&input='+b\,'SAME_TAB'); \\n //guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/forms/af/caltrans-eadr/welcome-statement.html?input='+b\,'SAME_TAB'); \\n }\\n //in else block\, error message will be shown on the screen if user credentials are incorrect\\n else{\\n OutputMessage.value=data.getElementsByTagName(\\"OutputMessage\\")[0].innerHTML;\\n OutputMessage.visible=true; \\n }\\n }\,\\n \\terror: function(err){\\n //this block is executed when server encounters any problem\\n \\t\\talert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n}\\n});\\n}\\n//this else will be executed when username and password are empty or null\\nelse{\\n OutputMessage.visible=true; \\n OutputMessage.value=\\"Please enter login credentials\\";\\n}"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"if(userNameTxtFogor.value!==null && userNameTxtFogor.value!==\\"\\"){\\nvar xmlData = \\"<data><UserLoginID>\\"+userNameTxtFogor.value.toUpperCase()+\\"</UserLoginID><ProcessType>Reset</ProcessType></data>\\";\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\, \\n //data: {'UserLoginID':userNameTxtFogor.value.toUpperCase()\,'ProcessType':\\"Reset\\"}\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\, \\n data : xmlData\,\\n //url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/SetPassword:1.0'\,\\n url : 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/processes/SetPassword'\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n if(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"OutputMessage\\")[0].innerHTML.includes(\\"The username does not exist.\\")){\\n ErrorMessageFogot.visible=true;\\n ErrorMessageFogot.value=data.getElementsByTagName(\\"OutputMessage\\")[0].innerHTML;\\n }\\n if(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"OutputMessage\\")[0].innerHTML.includes(\\"temporary password\\")){\\n //SuccessMessageForgot.visible=true;\\n //SuccessMessageForgot.value=data.getElementsByTagName(\\"OutputMessage\\")[0].innerHTML;\\n ///below 4lines newly added\\n MainPanel.visible=true;\\n SuccessResetMessage.visible=true;\\n ForgotPasswdPanel.visible=false;\\n SuccessResetMessage.value=data.getElementsByTagName(\\"OutputMessage\\")[0].innerHTML; \\n OutputMessage.visible=false;\\n OutputMessage.value=\\"\\";\\n }\\n }\,\\n \\terror: function(err){\\n \\t ErrorMessageFogot.visible=true;\\n ErrorMessageFogot.value=\\"something went wrong.\\";\\n}\\n});\\n}\\nelse{\\n ErrorMessageFogot.visible=true;\\n ErrorMessageFogot.value=\\"Please enter credentials.\\";\\n}"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.ForgotPasswdPanel.ButtonsPanelForgot.Submit"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

guidebutton.name: SubmitReset

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"if(existingPassBox.value!==null && existingPassBox.value!==\\"\\" && NewPassBox.value!==null && NewPassBox.value!==\\"\\" && ConfirmNewPassBox.value!==null && ConfirmNewPassBox.value!==\\"\\" ){\\n if(NewPassBox.value===ConfirmNewPassBox.value)\\n {\\n var params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\n var actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n \\tvar xmlData = \\"<data><UserLoginID>\\"+actualData.UserLoginID.toUpperCase()+\\"</UserLoginID><OldPassword>\\"+existingPassBox.value+\\"</OldPassword><NewPassword>\\"+ConfirmNewPassBox.value+\\"</NewPassword><ProcessType>Change</ProcessType></data>\\";\\n $.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url : 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/processes/SetPassword'\,\\n /*data: {\\n 'UserLoginID':actualData.UserLoginID.toUpperCase()\,\\n 'OldPassword':existingPassBox.value\,\\n 'NewPassword':ConfirmNewPassBox.value\,\\n 'ProcessType':\\"Change\\"\\n }\,*/\\n //url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/SetPassword:1.0'\,\\n data : xmlData\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n if(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"ChangeResult\\")[0].innerHTML==1){\\n ForgotPasswdPanel.visible=false;\\n ResetPasswdPanel.visible=false;\\n MainPanel.visible=true;\\n SuccessResetMessage.visible=true;\\n SuccessResetMessage.value=data.getElementsByTagName(\\"OutputMessage\\")[0].innerHTML;\\n params.delete('old');\\n params.delete('input');\\n }\\n else{\\n if(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"ChangeResult\\")[0].innerHTML!=1){\\n ErrorMessage.visible=true;\\n ErrorMessage.value=data.getElementsByTagName(\\"OutputMessage\\")[0].innerHTML;\\n }\\n }\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n });\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n ErrorMessage.visible=true;\\n ErrorMessage.value=\\"New Password and Confirm New Password field values do not match.\\";\\n }\\n}\\nelse{\\n ErrorMessage.visible=true;\\n ErrorMessage.value=\\"Please enter credentials.\\";\\n}"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.ResetPasswdPanel.ButtonsPanelReset.SubmitReset"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar navigationValue=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\nif(navigationValue.navigateReset == 1)\\n {\\n MainPanel.visible= false;\\n ForgotPasswdPanel.visible = false;\\n ResetPasswdPanel.visible = true;\\n }\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
